SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package brickGame.Controller

Class ButtonController

java.lang.Object
brickGame.Controller.ButtonController
public class ButtonController extends Object
The ButtonControls class is used to create the button handlers for the main menu buttons. It contains the methods to display the instructions and confirmation dialogs. It also contains the method to hide the buttons.

  • Constructor Details

      Constructor for the ButtonControls class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • createLoadButtonHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createLoadButtonHandler()
      The createLoadButtonHandler method creates the event handler for the load button. It calls the loadGame() method in the state class.
      Returns:
      The event handler for the load button.

    • createNewGameButtonHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createNewGameButtonHandler()
      The createNewGameButtonHandler creates the event handler for the new game button. It sets the game engine to the main class.
      Returns:
      The event handler for the new game button.

    • createExitButtonHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createExitButtonHandler()
      The createExitButtonHandler method creates the event handler for the exit button. Creates the event handler for the exit button. It displays the confirmation dialog with the title "Exit Game" and content "Are you sure you want to exit the game?". User can click the OK button to exit the game.
      Returns:
      The event handler for the exit button.

    • createInstructionsButtonHandler

      public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createInstructionsButtonHandler()
      The createInstructionsButtonHandler method creates the event handler for the instructions button. Creates the event handler for the instructions button. It calls the showInstructionsDialog() method.
      Returns:
      The event handler for the instructions button.

    • showConfirmationDialog

      public boolean showConfirmationDialog(String title, String content)
      The showConfirmationDialog method displays the confirmation dialog with the title and content. It is an alert dialog with the title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the confirmation dialog.
      content - The message of the confirmation dialog.
      Returns:
      True if the user clicks the OK button, false otherwise.

    • hideButtons

      public void hideButtons()
      The hideButtons method hides the main menu buttons. The buttons are loadButton, newGameButton, exitButton, and instructionsButton.
